description: heavy, flat base slightly flaring outward; large mouth; interior and underside of lid glazed tan; body and lid decorated with vertical and radiating linear pattern respectively; exterior glazed white over tan
markings: \'137 Robert Sutherland/Alfred, NY/jar, stoneware/$100.00\', on sticker, on bottom; \'RS/CR\', stamped into blay, on bottom
title: Jar with Cover
